title: UNC Fined for Violation of ACC Event Security Policy
desc: The ACC has issued a fine to the University of North Carolina for violating event security policies following a court storming after the Tar Heels beat Duke, 71-68, on Saturday night.

title: Borrowers are choosing Bajaj Finance over Tata Capital. But does the valuation add up?
desc: Tata Capital has posted a strong post-listing quarter but remains far smaller than Bajaj Finance in scale and reach. Yet, despite Bajajs larger franchise, faster growth and deeper deposit base, markets value Tata Capital more richly — raising questions over whether the premium is justified.
